item.title: Creating a Certificate Chain for AWS
item.description: GitHub Pages doesn’t (yet) allow an SSL certificate for a custom domain, so I’ve moved this blog to S3. Uploading the certificate to AWS requires the CA certificate chain. This isn’t always always provided by the CA, but can be generated from the command line. For example, Comodo provides the certificates in the chain, so all that’s necessary to create the file is to concatenate the certs in PEM format into one file:
